welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santa Barbara, Philippines! Get ready to be enchanted by our charming town known for its pristine beaches, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Restaurant "El Remanso"
restaurants.description: Restaurant "El Remanso" is a restaurant located in Santa Bárbara.
restaurants.address: Carretera Nacional, Vía Aguasay, Santa Barbara 6201, Estado Monagas

restaurants.description: Ouro Brasil Churrasqueria is a brazilian restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Loakan Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
